meta.description: Optimize the cost of a meal plan to meet daily nutritional requirements.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items to choose from.

params.name: protein_content
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food item.

params.name: carb_content
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food item.

params.name: calorie_content
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food item to include in the meal plan.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein_content[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 98 grams of protein are included in the meal plan.

constraints.name: carb_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carb_content[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 113 grams of carbohydrates are included in the meal plan.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calorie_content[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1768 calories are included in the meal plan.
